item.title: Windows Store (winget) App Not Supported in Preview in Intune
item.description: The new Windows Store App feature (aka WinGet installation) becomes more popular. However, this feature is still in preview. That means that not all is working as expected. Adding these applications using the portal has dependencies. One of those things is that an applications needs a valid version. Something not every application has. The results in an error like:
